Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Very Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: Carrie B
Reviews.Content: stayed nights trip amsterdam hotel close tram stop 24 staff extremely helpful firs timers spacious overlooked courtyard backside hotel wake morning hearing birds singing didnt hear noises guests breakfast wasnt extensive hotels offer beds werent shape rest roombathroom freshly renovated provide free wireless unlike hotels spotty cant staff location women traveling liked hotel quieter city 15 minute tram ride red light district central station

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay cannot fault”
Reviews.Author: 3petals
Reviews.Content: stayed 13 daughter 3 nights 1215 april deal via otelcom breakfast included reading reviews little apprehensive pleasantly surprised hotel easy found caught 24 tram quicker 1520 mins centre close shops restaurants museums excellent huge beds comfy brand bathroom clean gripe pillow continental breakfast lovely ok bacon eggs anyway dont eat holland coffee hot coffee machine fault stay book

Reviews.Content: hotel offer standard poor details amsterdam considered compromise beteween price service breakfast extremely poor isolated hear guests snoring imagine happens calm residential restaurant close museum square connected center train station wtc hospital free university using trams close closer schipol airport choice

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Quiet Area”
Reviews.Author: Accountess
Reviews.Content: stayed oct 69 nice hotel price typical european north america bathroom clean obviously newly renovated clean stairs except luggage complaints elevator didnt apply breakfast adequate staff helpful sometimes bit hard absolutely loved location city centre quiet street nights sleep steps tram convenient 1015 minutes downtown attractions

Reviews.Title: “poor quality, questionable service, not clean”

Reviews.Content: positives quiet location 15 min nice walk rai conference center people front desk nice coffee tea lobby time wine coca etc time negatives haha 4 star hotel minimal customer care management style bathroom smelled badly refused cold heating panels air inside heat 10 outside thermostat bathroom tiny beds comfortable tough blankets pillows avoid am picky expect hotel clean pleasant reasonably warm spend night conference trip

Reviews.Content: stayed week 4 star hotel property poorly maintained bathrooms filled mildew bed linens sheets smell unpleasant dont clean carpet stains bulb didnt fix night left hotel free breakfast booking staff friendly didnt fix bulb night left neighborhood location breakfast hotel stay hotel price paid stayed

Reviews.Content: hotel pure gem designed famous local architect previously private residence quaint offering amenities value staff little beaten path wonderful neighborhood intown pijp convenient tram service 50 yards hotel wonderful walk restaurants corner clean quiet neighborhood free breakfast service affair continental breakfast free internet staff freindly accomodating id stay anytime

Reviews.Content: looking quality hotel noise city option hotel tram line 1 min walk front door city center easily comfortable clean size staff met welcoming friendly trouble breakfast plentiful adequate coffee ok close museum opera house stay chance upmarket city nearby plenty lovely cafes restaurants minutes walk

Reviews.Title: “Quiet but not too far away from the fun!”

Reviews.Content: husband visited amsterdam month embark wonderful northern european cruise day amsterdam boarding cruise time lives plane landed amsterdam morning extremely happy arrived lovely hotel 900 am told ready check offered help ourselves breakfast free charge food satisfying entire staff friendly comfortable able catch zzzs ventured amazing city day sightseeing returned hotel nice local restaurant dinner advised try nearby italian restaurant named disappointed husband lasagne tasted restaurant reasonably priced night couple glasses wine included conversation friendly hotel staff fondest memories hotel amsterdam hope opportunity visit someday
